tool_description: Get torrents from the Pirate Bay
name: ThePirateBay
title: ThePirateBay

api_list.name: getCategories
api_list.description: Get all PirateBay's categories and sub-categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ThePirateBayvolodimir-kudriachenkoV1.p.rapidapi.com/getCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ThePirateBayvolodimir-kudriachenkoV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
